item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Lines from center
item.description: var sketch = document.getElementById('sketch') function setup() { var canvas = createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight) canvas.parent('#sketch') } function draw() { line(width/2, height/2, mouseX, mouseY) } function windowResized() { resizeCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight); }
